examplePhrases: Alexa, ask My Radio to play In Medias Res
en-US.name: In Medias Res
en-US.description:
Listen to In Medias Res Radio, with less bla bla bla, and more la la la.

This Radio provides a high quality sound 24/7 with the best music.

To start, just say "Alexa, launch My In Medias Res" or "Alexa, play In Medias Res" to start the radio".

At anytime, you can stop the radio by saying "Alexa, stop"
